bwwExcerpt: Most New York City guidebooks include the obligatory capsule history of the city. But tourists wanting to get to the core of the Big Apple would be better served seeing Colin Quinn's new one-man show...The New York Story...is a breezily entertaining comedic lecture that makes him seem like the coolest university professor ever...He particularly concentrates on the uniquely feisty New York attitude ("It's the only city that has blue-collar snobs") which he laments is now disappearing...The raspy-
